file.name: openapi.yaml
file.content:
security:
  - {}
info:
  title: HPI-Schul-Cloud version Service API
  description:
    This is the API specification for the HPI-Schul-Cloud version service.
    
  contact:
    name: support
    email: info@dbildungscloud.de
  license:
    name: GPL-3.0
    url: 'https://github.com/hpi-schul-cloud/schulcloud-server/blob/master/LICENSE'
  version: 1.0.0

components:
  schemas:
    migration:
      type: object
      properties:
        _id:
          type: string
          pattern: '^[0-9a-f]{24}$'
        state:
          type: string
          enum: [up, down]
        name:
          type: string
        createdAt:
          type: string
          format: date-time
        __v:
          type: integer
    version:
      type: object
      properties:
        sha:
          type: string
          pattern: '^[0-9a-f]{40}$'
        version:
          type: string
        branch:
          type: string
        message:
          type: string
        birthtime:
          type: string
        migrations:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/migration'
        age:
          type: integer
        startedAt:
          type: string
          format: date-time

paths:
  /version:
    get:
      responses:
        '200':
          description: success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/version'
        '405':
          description: not allowed - returned if the route is disabled on this server. Commonly the case for dev environments.
        '500':
          description: general error
      description: Retrieves the version of the server.
      summary: ''
      tags:
        - version
      security: []
  
openapi: 3.0.2
tags:
  - name: version
    description: A version service.
